welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bessemer, a charming city known for its rich history and hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets and embrace the unique experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
